name: Findr the Game
description:
What is "Findr"?

Findr is a 2D Visual Novel dating sim where the player experiences 21st century dating, and has to discover hidden objects in a surreal Berlin setting.

Who we are?

We are two Game Design and four Game Art Students at the School 4 Games GmbH in Berlin and on a path, to learn the ways in the Gaming Industry. Our author is an external hobby writer bribed by us with ice cream.

The Team

Cole B. - Team Lead, Programming

Eric B. - Producer, Programming

Caelan T. - Lead Artist, 2D Artist

Chiara C. - 2D Artist, UI/UX

Iris K. - 2D Artist, Backgrounds

Lukas R. - 2D Artist, Characters

Alex K. - Writer
